nodes.name: Privacy Notice
nodes.description: Please note that this call will be recorded for quality assurance purposes. Your privacy, security and data are important to us, and will only be used for providing better service to you. Be assured that we will keep your personal information in strict confidence

nodes.name: Main Menu
nodes.description: To block your account, press 1. To know how much loan you can request, press 2. To retrieve your BVN, press 3. To request information on your account, press 4. To find out how to get a token, press 5. To get your routing number or swift code, press 6. To speak to one of our call centre agents, press 7. To listen to the options again, press 0

nodes.name: Routing Number or Swift Code Enquiry
nodes.description: Press 6 - Routing number or swift code inquiry

nodes.name: Agent Transfer
nodes.description: Press 7 - Transfer to call centre agent - Skill Name: Q2_1st_1
